title: Roger Williams National Memorial: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations        To download PDF applications for some of our most common permits, please click on the links below. Special use permit application (10-930) Commercial filming/photography short form application (10-931) Commercial filming/photography long form application (10-932)  For assistance with these applications and/or for general information about using the park for a special event, please contact the Site Manager at 401.521.7266.
